content: row 1 rs *k1 p1 repeat from * to the bind off last 8 sts k8 sample uses a standard knit bind off row 2 ws k7 *p1 k1 repeat from * to 1 st p1 right front - hem work row 1 & 2 - 7 times 14 total row or using the rib needles until your hem measures 2 5 6 5 cm from co 30 32 36 40 42 46 sts the co edge setup row ws *p1 k1 repeat from * to the last 8 sts p1 k7 left front - body row 1 rs k8 *p1 k1 repeat from * switch to gauge needles the needle size you across matched gauge with row 2 ws *p1 k1 repeat from * to the row 1 rs knit across last 8 sts p1 k7 row 2 ws k7 purl across work row 1 & 2 - 7 times 14 total row or work row 1 & 2 until your hem measures 2 5 6 5 cm from shorter version 32 30 30 32 32 the co edge 34 times 64 60 60 64 64 68 row in the same amount you worked for the left front total or until your piece measures 14 75 14 14 14 75 14 75 15 5 37 5 right front - body 35 5 35 5 37 5 37 5 39 5 cm from switch to gauge needles the co edge row 1 rs knit across longer version 48 45 44 44 42 42 row 2 ws purl across to the last 7 sts k7 times 96 90 88 88 84 84 row in work row 1 & 2 total or until your piece measures shorter version 32 30 30 32 32 34 20 75 19 75 19 25 19 25 18 5 18 5 times 64 60 60 64 64 68 row in 52 5 50 49 49 47 47 cm from the total or until your piece measures co edge 14 75 14 14 14 75 14 75 15 5 37 5 35 5 35 5 37 5 37 5 39 5 cm from left front - armhole shaping the co edge row 1 rs bobble 4 sts knit across longer version 48 45 44 44 42 42 26 28 32 36 38 42 sts times 96 90 88 88 84 84 row in row 2 ws k7 purl across total or until your piece measures 20 75 19 75 19 25 19 25 18 5 18 5 52 5 50 49 49 47 47 cm from the co edge beginner cardigan - the blue mouse 2023 5 right front - armhole shaping longer version 48 45 44 44 42 42 row 1 rs knit across times 96 90 88 88 84 84 row in row 2 ws bobble 4 sts purl to the last 7 sts total or until your piece measures k7 20 75 19 75 19 25 19 25 18 5 18 5 26 28 32
